author: Staff Reporter
text:
About 12 sovereigns of gold jewellery was stolen from a house when the occupant of the house L. Gowrishankar of Sabari Nagar in Karamadai had gone out of town from January 23 to 27.

On returning home on Wednesday, he came to know that someone removed the exhaust fan in the kitchen and entered the house.

Arrested

C. Arunkumar (23), who climbed a mobile phone tower at J.J. Nagar in Chettipalayam on Wednesday and created a flutter by threatening to jump off was arrested by Chettipalayam Police and remanded the same night.

He was booked under four sections of Indian Penal Code including 447 (punishment for criminal trespass) and 309 (attempt to suicide).

Chain snatched

A 1.5-sovereign gold chain was snatched from S. Lalith (49), of Kannan Nagar in Sivalingapuram, Ondipudur, when she was drawing rangoli in front of her house on Wednesday.

Singanallur Crime Police are investigating the incident.
title: House burgled at Karamadai
